projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A cutting-edge e-commerce platform with real-time inventory management, AI-powered product recommendations, and seamless payment processing. Features include dynamic product filtering, user authentication, and an intuitive admin dashboard.

projects.title: AI Task Manager
projects.description: An intelligent task management system that uses machine learning to prioritize tasks, predict completion times, and suggest optimal work schedules. Includes real-time collaboration features and automated progress tracking.

projects.title: Climate Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: A sophisticated weather analytics platform that combines real-time weather data with machine learning models to provide accurate forecasts and climate trend analysis. Features interactive 3D visualizations and predictive modeling.

projects.title: Social Analytics Hub
projects.description: A comprehensive social media analytics platform that leverages AI to track engagement metrics, sentiment analysis, and trend prediction across multiple platforms. Features real-time data processing and interactive reports.
